Material used.Description: The study used HEK293 cells overexpressing DJ-1 variants to assess protein expression and apoptosis.

Readout description.Result Description: The L166P variant showed increased apoptosis compared to wild-type DJ-1, with protein expression levels reduced by 30% in Western Blot analysis.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of wild-type levels

Material used.Description: LDH release was measured in HEK293 cells expressing DJ-1 variants to assess apoptosis.

Readout description.Result Description: The L166P variant caused a 40% increase in LDH release compared to wild-type DJ-1, indicating enhanced apoptosis.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LDH release less than 20% of total cell lysate

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LDH release greater than 40% of total cell lysate
